item.description:
This event is hosted by the Tuft's Freethought Society. As stated on their Facebook Event Page:

"Daniel C. Dennett, philosopher and cognitive scientist, will be lecturing at Tufts on Oct. 11th. There is really no single sentence to describe his credentials, the enormous number of his published works, or his status among academic circles. These are just some highlights on Daniel Dennett!

Do not miss this opportunity! As a Tufts professor, Daniel Dennet is right on our doorstep. Utilize this rare opportunity to see what the Tufts faculty has to offer!"
item.name: "What should replace religion?" - a talk by Daniel Dennett
